title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Index Plunges 17.1% Over Weekend
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Among the underperformers, Filecoin (FIL) dropped 33.9% and Aave (AAVE) fell 29.3%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3112.63, down 17.1% (-641.58) since 4 p.m. ET on Friday.

None of the 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: BTC (-6.8%) and SOL (-14.8%).

Laggards: FIL (-33.9%) and AAVE (-29.3%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The news reports significant price declines across all 20 assets in the CoinDesk 20 Index, with the index plunging 17.1% and no assets trading higher.
